FuncDef: This command configures the IPv4 or IPv6 address for the LDAP server.

ParaDef.Info: The IP address of the LDAP server.

Specifies the port ID. The port is the LDAP server listening port; by default it is 389 but if the listening port on LDAP server is changed, this command needs to be configured accordingly. Values-1 to 65535. ParamDefault: Default- 389
